text: Askolds Hermanovskis (19 September 1912 - 18 August 1967) was a Latvian alpine skier. He competed in the men's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Latvian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Latvia Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Riga
title: Askolds Hermanovskis
